casebody.data:
Jack CORDEIRO and Alda Cordeiro; Appellants,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York as trustee FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDERS CWALT, INC., ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2005-27 MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2005-27; SunTrust Bank; Belle Harbor Owner's Association, Inc. ; Tenant #1 n/k/a Cheryl White, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-2256 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed June 27, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
